name: Art Attack
description:
A two player game which involves painting the ground as much as possible, be careful though as the other player can paint over yours. Whoever painted the most at the end wins.  Use power ups to gain the advantage and emerge victorious.

- Programming By Daniel Burley

- Character Design and Sprites by Leonard Ferenc

- Backgrounds and Additional Sprites by Flynn Coltman

- Level Design + Additional Sprites by Alfie Parkes

- Music from "Monolith" by Team D-13

- Made as part of the One Minute Game Jam 5. This project was made in 2 days.
